hero.title: We Are Vispaico
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Niels. I built Vispaico because I was tired of the bullshit.
I've been writing code for 20+ years. Started in East Germany, worked across England, Belgium, and spent 15 years in Spain‚Äîmostly in the car industry, bouncing between factories and client sites.
The problem? I had an authority problem. Always did. Hated being told to wait, to slow down, to 'follow the process' when I knew we could ship faster.

After two decades of global travel (airports, hotels, meetings that could've been emails), I landed in Vietnam. Met my wife, started a family, and realized I was done moving. But I wasn't done building.
So I started Vispaico in 2019. The mission was simple: build websites the way they should be built‚Äîfast, modern, no agency markup, no waiting weeks for something that takes 24 hours.
hero.frustrationsHeading: Here's what pisses me off about this industry:
frustrations: Overpriced agencies charging $10K for a basic site
Slow WordPress sites that kill your credibility
Jargon-heavy devs who hide behind complexity
Waiting times that make no sense
differences: We ship in 24 hours (12 hours if you're in a rush, 6 if it's an emergency)
We cut everything that can be cut‚ÄîAI handles the boring parts, scripts handle the tedious parts
We speak human, not dev jargon
We're in Vietnam, which means better rates and time zone magic (you brief us, we build while you sleep)
hero.familyParagraph: The best part? I'm building this with my kids. My three kids watch me work, help with small tasks, and learn that you don't need permission to build something great. My oldest son from Spain works with me full-time now.
hero.lifestyleParagraph: This isn't just a business. It's a lifestyle, a mindset, and a way to stay free.
hero.closing: If you're tired of agencies that move like molasses, let's talk.

process.title: How It Works - No Meetings Required

items.question: Is this the right website for me?
answer: Yes, if you need a real online presence that works. Not just a brochure site that sits there.

This works for service businesses, consultants, e-commerce stores, SaaS founders, agencies, education platforms‚Äîanyone who needs visitors to find them, understand what they do, and take action (book a call, make a purchase, sign up).
It doesn't work if: You need a website in 4 hours (we need 3 days) or you want us to run your marketing (we build the foundation; you drive the traffic).
Unsure? Email niels@vispaico.com. We'll tell you straight up if we're the right fit.

items.question: What information do you need from me?
answer: Not much:
Your business name
What you actually do (1-2 sentences is fine)
Your main goal (sell products? Generate leads? Build authority?)
Any text or images you want included
Rough notes work. A brain dump works. We'll build from there.
If you have nothing, we can source images and write copy for you‚Äîjust tell us.

items.question: Do you write the content, or do I?
answer: We do the heavy lifting.
We'll write your homepage copy, about page, service descriptions‚Äîwhatever tells your story clearly. If you have existing content, send it. If you don't, we write it.
Same with images: we source them (or you provide your own). We handle the layout and optimization.
Your job: Give us your business details and approve it. That's it.

items.question: What about the Domain, Hosting, and Emails?
answer: Everything's included for 1 year. You don't touch anything:
‚úì Domain registration (brand new domain or transfer yours)
‚úì Web hosting (fast, reliable, no monthly surprises)
‚úì SSL security (encrypted, professional, HTTPS)
‚úì GDPR compliant (forms, tracking, data handling‚Äîall legal)
‚úì Professional email addresses (up to 100 accounts)
‚úì Instructions to connect to Outlook, Apple Mail, Gmail, whatever you use
Year 2: You renew the domain + hosting directly (~$120-180/year) or we can handle renewals for you. No lock-in.

items.question: What if I need to make changes after launch?
answer: 7 days: Unlimited revisions. Anything you want adjusted, we fix it.
Days 8-30: Free technical support for bugs or questions.
After 30 days: You own everything. Change it yourself (via the CMS) or add us to a maintenance plan if you want ongoing support.
100% satisfaction guarantee: If we don't deliver what we promised, you get a full refund. We mean it.

items.question: Can I manage the website myself after launch?
answer: Yes.
Your site includes a headless CMS (Storyblok). You can:
Write and publish articles anytime
Update content without coding
Add new pages when you're ready
Manage everything yourself
But you don't have to. If you want us to handle content, maintenance, or updates, that's what our growth services are for.

items.question: What makes this different from other agencies?
answer: Three things:
1. Speed
We don't do discovery calls, mood boards, or revision loops. We build. You launch. 3 days, not 3 months.
2. Honesty
One price. One timeline. No surprises. No project managers charging you to manage meetings about meetings. No "scope creep" because the scope is clear from day one.
3. Real tech
Most agencies use outdated page builders that trap you. We use Next.js + headless CMS. Your site can grow into anything‚Äîdashboards, e-commerce, complex features. You're not limited by templates.

items.question: What happens on Day 1, Day 2, Day 3?
answer: Day 1: We design your site based on your info and build the foundation.
Day 2-3: We build, test, integrate email, optimize for Google, deploy to live servers.
Day 3 evening: Your site is live. We send you the keys. You launch.
Days 4-30: Free support for any questions or bugs.

items.question: What's the catch?
answer: There isn't one.
We charge $899 because we built a process that works fast. We don't charge a premium for speed‚Äîwe pass the savings to you.
You own everything. No licensing fees. No monthly platform costs. No lock-in.
Year 2, if you want to leave, you leave. Your site keeps running.

items.question: I'm still not sure. What do I do?
answer: Fill out the form. We'll send you the contract (no obligation to sign).
Or email niels@vispaico.com and ask anything. He'll reply within a few hours.

items.question: What is Vispaico?
items.answer: We're a web development team that builds professional websites fast without the agency nonsense. No discovery calls, no project managers, no 6-month timelines. Just websites that work, delivered when promised.

items.question: Why should I choose you over a local web agency?
items.answer: Agencies charge $5k-15k and take 3-6 months with endless meetings. We deliver the same quality in days, not months, for a fraction of the cost. Plus you own everything - no monthly hosting fees or maintenance contracts.

items.question: What if I don't like the design?
items.answer: You get 7 days of unlimited revisions after delivery. We keep tweaking until you're happy. Most clients love the first version, but we're not done until you are.

items.question: Do you handle content and copywriting?
items.answer: Yes. If you don't have content ready, we'll write it for you. Just tell us about your business in your own words - we'll turn it into professional web copy that converts.

items.question: What happens after my website is built?
items.answer: You own everything. The website, domain, hosting, and all files. You can update it yourself or hire anyone to maintain it. No vendor lock-in, no ongoing fees unless you want our help.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
items.answer: We include 30 days of technical support and 7 days of revisions with every project. After that, ongoing maintenance is optional - many clients prefer to handle updates themselves since we build user-friendly sites.

items.question: Can I see examples of your work?
items.answer: Absolutely! Visit our Portfolio to see real projects we've built for restaurants, contractors, consultants, and online stores.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Choose your service and fill out the form. You'll get a contract and invoice within an hour. Pay when you're ready to start, and we'll have your site live within the promised timeframe.

items.question: Do you have a Technical Support policy?
items.answer: YES, 30 days of technical bug fixes included after project delivery. If something breaks due to our code, we fix it free.

items.question: Do you have a Revisions policy?
items.answer: YES, 7 days of unlimited revisions after delivery. Change colors, text, layout - whatever you need to make it perfect.

items.question: Do you have a money back policy?
items.answer: YES, full refund if we can't deliver what we promised within 24 hours of supposed completion. We've never had to use it, but it's there for your peace of mind.

items.question: Do you do SEO?
items.answer: Every website we build is SEO-optimized from day one - proper titles, meta descriptions, fast loading, mobile-friendly. We don't do ongoing SEO campaigns, but your site will be found on Google.

items.question: What about hosting and domains?
items.answer: Included for 1 year with most services. We register your domain, set up hosting, security/SSL, and configure everything. After 1 year, you can renew with us or take it anywhere - you own it all.
